help_document.overview: Get Expression will allow a user to query data uploaded after the Affy analysis pipeline is completed.

summary.name: Go to GetExpression Page
summary.description: Follow the steps below to find the GetExpression Page

all_steps.step: Select the Microarray Link in the main navigation bar
Click the GetExpression button located on the main navigation bar

summary.name: Data Columns to select for use in Cytoscape
summary.description: The Following columns MUST be selected in order to ensure the data can be loaded into Cytoscape

all_steps.step: Show All Conditions if one condition meets criteria

summary.name: Load Results set into Cytoscape
summary.description: After the query is done, click the link at the bottom of the GetExpression for Cytoscape

summary.name: Go to Cytoscape Section
summary.description: View Affy Expression Data in Cytoscape

extra_data.description: Learn more about viewing data in Cytoscape

summary.name: Go Back to the Pipeline Overview
summary.description: Go Back to the Pipeline Overview
